Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th Street/Halsted
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentworth, & 69th, due to street blockage near 69th Street/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentworth, & 69th, due to street blockage near 69th Street/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cortland/Southport
ShortDescription: WB 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Clybourn, Sheffield, North Ave, Elston, & Cortland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Southport.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Clybourn, Sheffield, North Ave, Elston, & Cortland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Southport.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green & Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green & Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green & Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
